pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sparse Fused Plackett-Luce // Implements the methodological developments found in Hermes, van Heerwaarden, and Behrouzi (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2308.04325, and allows for the statistical modeling of multi-group rank data in combination with object variables. The package also allows for the simulation of synthetic multi-group rank data.
